name: Toscana Inn Hotel

reviews.title: Toscana Inn
reviews.text: Toscana Inn is an excellent choice in Panama City. I've stayed there several times while in Panama on business. The hotel is very clean, well-maintained and the location is great. There are excellent restaurants in walking distance, several of my favorites are only steps away. Because the guest room floors are all tile, as usual in Panama, I found the room a wee bit noisy during the day. The breakfast is adequate, but not elaborate. The icing on the cake for this hotel is the staff. They are simply wonderful. I don't speak Spanish, and the first night I was there, I called for room service. The person answering the phone didn't speak English, but cheerfully connected me to the hotel manager who took my order and had it delivered within minutes! The front desk and lobby staff will greet you by name throughout your stay and offer any help. You will begin to feel like you're among old friends by the second day of your stay. I highly recommend this hotel when you visit Panama City for business or pleasure.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Inn is just terrific. One can see the Italian touches all around, from the furniture to the bedspread. I felt very secure and comfortable, and the front desk was helpful. Also, it is located right next to Avis car rental. Food was good as well.
reviews.title: Look No Further

reviews.text: The Toscana Inn Hotel is a very nice hotel. Locacted immeditatly adjacent the business district (near the Veneto Hotel), the Toscana Inn Hotel is off the beat and path of busy Panama City. The hotel is newer, and is very quiet. Your room comes with a breakfast included each morning.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Have just returned from a trip to Panama. Spent a night at the Toscana Inn...what a nice experience.
reviews.title: Hidden gem!

reviews.text: Checkin went smoothly and Moses was very helpful with parking our car. We were asked if we wanted coffee, tea or water as we were checking in ......it was delivered to us, free of charge!
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.text: This hotel represents good mid-price value. Located in the heart of downtown Panama City, it offers excellent access to dozens of nearby restaurants, two gyms, a fantastic breakfast, which changes daily, free coffee all day (and espresso/cappuccino for purchase), and much more. Plus perhaps the most comfortable bed pillows I have ever experienced at a hotel, and they give you four with each bed. Most importantly, the staff and management really bend over backwards to help you.
reviews.title: A gem in the middle of it downtown Panama City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good, can tell cater to travellers from N.America and europe. They have all the items would need and clean, not over the top but good. Busy location which is good!
reviews.title: Good for Panama 4 star

reviews.text: My family and I enjoyed many days at this conveniently-located hotel that is in walking distance to many great restaurants in the Cangrejo District of Panama City. The service personnel were very helpful and polite, and the hotel is very clean. The best feature of the hotel, in my opinion, were the rooms, which were equipped with clean, high-quality linens and very comfortable beds. The decor was cozy, and the showers are powerful and exhilarating. At its price, the hotel can't be beat. The only aspect I found a little disappointing were the breakfasts. The coffee was good and fruit could be found each day, but the hot options were weak.
reviews.title: Excellent Value-Clean, comfortable rooms, ok breakfast

reviews.text: Booked this place because of the positive feedback on this page. And I can say: It was a good choice! You get offered coffee on arrival - check in very fast. Room OK (in another review in here, somebody mentioned that room 201 had a nice view - that is correct, if you like to watch walls of the house next door...).
reviews.title: 5 Star Staff

reviews.text: Had dinner there twice and was really nice. Breakfast is nothing special - but still OK.
reviews.title: Great staff, and good location

reviews.text: We spent three nights at this lovely hotel. We do not enjoy BIG hotels in large cities ..this hotel is just the right size. The service is outstanding. Gretta..gets a big star along with other front desk staff to help. English is limited....but the effort is appreciated. The beds are super comfortable and the rooms and common areas clean. At first we were put off on the location but learned quickly that with construction in the city for the new subway...that this spot is not only safe but within walking distance (easy) to many really good restaurants. The hotel arranged a shuttle to pick us up at the airport ..which was a good idea as prices are all over the place for this service. We came to Panama to view why Americans would come to live in this country for retirement or winter get away homes. so..starting off in the City was a great way to start. We took a city tour that the hotel set up and it was fantastic. (open air bus).
reviews.title: This time Tripadvisor was right on the mark for a city hotel

reviews.text: Make sure when you hire a driver...that the driver speaks some English...and that the price is confirmed ahead of time in front of someone at the hotel desk.
reviews.title: Good location and helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also confirm the night prior again with the driver...we had a problem with this and at the last minute had to take a driver out to the Valley on Sunday who later caused problems with payment and became very rude.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in Panama City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We learned a lot....the people of Panama are truly wonderful...the country is gorgeous and is most progressive. It was hot...but not as bad as we were told it would be. Again...we felt safe the entire trip..most important to us.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was a great pick I found on TA. It was much less expensive than the big Casino or chain hotels and had everything we could have asked for. It is located in a nice part of the city only a block or two from the Veneto Casino (biggest in PC). The hotel itself is very nice and has large rooms with t.v, wi-fi, and good sized bathrooms. It was very clean and haD a nice roof top patio garden where we sat several nights and had drinks before dinner. The staff was vey helpful in arranging cabs, trips to the canal, and had some good tips on things to do and places to eat. Overall I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel in Panama City.
reviews.title: Good location, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just a very short one night stand at the Toscana - recommended by Tranquilo Bay Resort as ideal for a reasonably priced Panama City hotel. It's all the various review says, and the bedroom and bathroom and general decorative condition put many more seriously expensive hotels to shame.
reviews.title: WHEN FIRST IMPRESSIONS COUNT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Definitely recommendable.........
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Located downton on a quieter street, away from the main Via Venetto. Still some morning and afternoon rush hour traffic, but it dies down after that. Walking distance to restaurants and shops. No excersice room or pool, but we walked to Cinta Costera Avenida Balboa (about a 20 min walk) and ran a couple of miles on the strip. Also near Causeway (good place for runs, walks or biking), but driving distance. Great food at reasonable price. Kudos to the chef. And great friendly staff. Room is comfortable, clean, free wifi (a must), also internet available in a small computer room near the lobby. Tea and coffee is brouhgt up to your room at request, free of charge! Breakfast included.
reviews.title: Absolutely Tops!

reviews.text: I stayed at the Toscana Inn for one week in February .Having travelled all over the world and stayed in countless hotels I have to give this place a AAA Plus rating in every way! Price, comfort, food, staff, every absolutely tops!!
reviews.title: It is my home in Panama

reviews.text: Well I have been a client for quite a few trips to Panama, and every time I find something new but I will not change my routine, -I always have Cheff Centeno prepare the Trout al Ajillo for dinner. There are few hotels that have this kind of cuisine.
reviews.title: Very good hotel in downtown Panama City

description: Whether you’re traveling to Panama City for business or a vacation getaway, we make all visits to Toscana Inn Hotel comfortable and relaxing with exceptional service, a welcoming staff, and beautifully appointed hotel suites.Perfectly located in Panama City’s prestigious El Cangrejo district, Toscana Inn Hotel in Panama offers effortless access to everything you might want to see or do, from the sparkling beach to exclusive shopping, vibrant nightlife, fascinating cultural and historical sites, and more. Rated one of the best hotels in Panama by Trip Advisor, our focus is on the comfort of our guests and the quality and value of our rooms and services. Let Toscana Inn Hotel be your host in Panama City.
